content:
Welcome to #trifolia-on-fhir.

Description: A place to chat about Trifolia-on-FHIR (an open-source tool for creating implementation guide artifacts). The ToF development team will post important notifications to this channel (such as when updates are being applied to the publicly available server, when major bugs have been fixed, etc.) The public GitHub repository for Trifolia-on-FHIR is located here: https://www.github.com/lantanagroup/trifolia-on-fhir
